FAQ / Wave 8 / Characters /
View On Teletraan1.net

Junkion Nancy - Just Say No to Sparkplugs!

  1. With Junkion Nancy's station ability, if I focus and then scrap a card, is that +2 defence? [Source: Aequitas]
    No. Focus includes the act of scrapping, so Nancy only provides +1 defence to the stationed character.
  2. Is Junkion Nancy's station ability affected by Aerial Recon? [Source: Aequitas]
    Yes, but only as long as you decide to scrap the card that Aerial Recon reveals.
  3. If my character stationed on Junkion Nancy has Focus 3, do I get +3 defence? [Source: Aequitas]
    No. Focus stacks into a single event, so on defending, a character with Focus 3 would use Focus only once per each defence.
